summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from August 26, 2019, forwarding an update on the Jeffrey Epstein investigation. It discusses coordination between FBI units (CID and NY) regarding the preparation and distribution of the update.

persons.name: SSA - Violent Crime Unit (CTD) (FBI)
persons.context: The sender of the forwarded email, providing the Epstein investigation update from the Violent Crime Unit.

events.title: Epstein Investigation Update Coordination
events.description: Internal FBI coordination to prepare and distribute an update on the Jeffrey Epstein investigation, including a scheduled call between CID and NY units.

keyFacts: The document is an internal FBI email dated August 26, 2019, concerning the Jeffrey Epstein investigation.
It indicates ongoing coordination between FBI units, specifically CID and the New York field office, regarding case updates.
The email mentions that an update containing 'ASC and UC' (likely referring to Asset Seizure and Undercover operations or similar) was prepared and placed in a portal.
